text: melum, ‘‘niccayamaka allahvutaiya vakkuruti unmaiyanatu, marumai varuvatil arave cantekamillai'' enru (unkalukkuk) kurappattal atarku, ‘‘marumai innatenre nankal ariyom. Atu (vinana) verum ennattait tavira verillai enre ennukirom. Atai (meyyenru) nankal nampavumillai'' enru ninkal kurinirkal (allava?) Enru (avarkalitam) ketkappatum
